title: Change all of AATROX scalings to ap
body:
This might make him viable as a hybrid. Hextech gb, nashors, zhonyas, abyssal, protobelt, liandries, etc
I think it might make him a good hybrid diver and he heals % scaling off ap once every 3 autoes
Just a thought

replies.body: The reason why Aatrox is not viable isn't because Riot doesn't know how to buff him. They just don't want him to be strong.
He just needs a full rework.
